feeds.title: Feeds
feeds.description: Configure the external data feeds from a variety of photo sources

GROUP.label: Group
GROUP.description: (Optional) Include photos from this group. Keep in mind that some services (Flickr) use a group id that is not the same as the group name

AUTHOR.label: Author
AUTHOR.description: (Optional) Include only photos from this author/user. Keep in mind that some services (Flickr) use a user id that is not the same as the user name

TAG.label: Tag
TAG.description: (Optional) Include only photos with this tag
